siteMetadata.title: #COCONUT
siteMetadata.description: Lab website for COCONUT Computer Club at Makassar, Indonesia

home.title: Research Group @ COCONUT Computer Club
home.description: The Computer Club Oriented Network, Utility & Technology (COCONUT) was established in April 2008 at the School of Informatics Management and Computer (STMIK Professional, Indonesia), for conducting research and development activities in the fields of Computer Science and Information Technology. It was envisioned as an institute for advanced and high-quality applied research, working in collaboration with industries and other academic institutions on national and international levels to bring about the IT revolution in Indonesia and help build a knowledge-driven economy.
home.paramx: COCONUT has expanded its membership beyond STMIK Professional to include students from various universities, such as Universitas Muhammadiyah (UNISMUH), Universitas Negeri Makassar (UNM), Universitas Hasanuddin (UNHAS), Universitas Muslim Indonesia (UMI), and Universitas Islam Negeri (UIN). Officially registered with the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia under registration number AHU-0012037.AH.01.07.TAHUN 2022, COCONUT is dedicated to creating a new generation of researchers and young engineers.
home.paramy: Many of COCONUT's members have gone on to become engineers and professionals in leading global industries. We provide a supportive and motivational environment to foster innovation, develop advanced technologies, and contribute to Indonesiaâ€™s progress as a knowledge-driven economy.
home.interests: Computer Vision || Cyber Security || Applied Machine Learning || High Performance Services
home.funders: We got generous funding support from many organizations including Center for Open Science. You can see our funders below.
home.collaborators: We collaborate with multiple researchers, institutes, conferences, and organizations from outside and in Indonesia. This includes IDSECCONF, MEH Labs, PT Lontar Riset Indonesia, AI Research Indonesia, and many others.
